universal.under_construction: CONTENTS OF HIVE ARE UNDER REVIEW ......
universal.under_verification: According to the regulations and policies issued by the related Chinese administrative authorities, contents provided by HIVE are under the obligatory verification process and will be open to the public again once passed.
universal.waiting_to_be_initialized: Waiting for the initialization process to be executed...
universal.please_wait_while_loading: Please wait while loading data from the server...
universal.error_detail: The details of the error are listed as follows:

users.get_all_users_error: Error occurred when get all users
users.please_select_a_field: Please select a field in the pane and fill in the forms and click submit

about.cv_text: Enter the 5-digit code in the input from the link below to get a Curriculum Vitae. (The 5-digit code can be found under the QR code in the PDF)
about.ps_text: Enter the 5-digit code in the input from the link below to get a Personal Statement. (The 5-digit code can be found under the QR code in the PDF)
about.rp_text: Enter the 5-digit code in the input from the link below to get a Research Proposal. (The 5-digit code can be found under the QR code in the PDF)
about.rf_text: Enter the 5-digit code in the input from the link below to get a Reference. (The 5-digit code can be found under the QR code in the PDF)
about.tbd_text: Enter the 5-digit code in the input from the link below to get a Transcript for Bachelor Degree. (The 5-digit code can be found under the QR code in the PDF)
about.tmd_text: Enter the 5-digit code in the input from the link below to get a Transcript for Master Degree. (The 5-digit code can be found under the QR code in the PDF)
about.elc_text: Enter the 5-digit code in the input from the link below to get a English Language Certificate. (The 5-digit code can be found under the QR code in the PDF)
about.bgc_text: Enter the 5-digit code in the input from the link below to get a Bachelor Graduation Certificate. (The 5-digit code can be found under the QR code in the PDF)
